channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13463] Fix ImportSemanticAnalyzer to allow for different src/dst filesystems
item.description: In ImportSemanticAnalyzer, there is an assumption that the src filesystem for import and the final location are on the same filesystem. Therefore the check for emptiness and getExternalTmpLocation will be looking on the wrong filesystem and will cause an error. The output path should be fed into getExternalTmpLocation to get a temporary file on the correct filesystem. The check for emptiness should use the output filesystem.
item.summary: Fix ImportSemanticAnalyzer to allow for different src/dst filesystems

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
